title: WeSleep
author: WeSleep
content: Start of New Meta: Sleep to EarnYear 2022 will be written in history books as a start of new Meta â€” Sleep to Earn and WeSleep aims to be a pioneer of such approach. In order to achieve our goals we are not only building a Web3 app with inbuilt Game-Fi elements which awards users for their sleep time, instead we are building a worldwide brand by positioning ourselves as an app-assistant for users to look after their sleep quality as well as build a healthier and more active lifestyle.Sweet RewardsAt its core WeSleep app will allow users to monetise their sleep time by rewarding them with $ZZZ tokens. However, in order to be eligible for rewards users will need to hold at least one Sleepie, which has a specific set of attributes such as drowsiness, fatigue, luck or devotion.In addition, WeSleep is aiming to provide a tool for its users which would not only enable them to monetise their sleep time, but at the same time would encourage them to build a healthier, more active lifestyle. In order to achieve such goal, users will be getting Daily Tasks to complete on a daily basis, which would then generate their rewards in Moons.Daily task examples:- Walk at least 3 000 steps;- Run 1 mile;- Go for a 45 minutes walk;- Have a swim;- Have a gym session;- Burn at least 1 200 calories;- Etc.Every time a daily task is completed, a specific amount of Moons are credited to the Profile, which then are to be used to level up the Profile itself and earn additional rewards.Join us and become part of New Meta:- Twitter: https://twitter.com/WeSleepOfficial- Website: https://wesleep.io/- Medium: https://medium.com/@WeSleep- Whitepaper: https://motpovilas.gitbook.io/wesleep-whitepaper-v1

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: I liked the project proposal and it will certainly be great to be rewarded for activities that we do naturally daily. I was just unsure about one thing. How do you intend to generate value for Tokens?It would be interesting if we could use them to buy wellness products, and pay for the gym, for example, do you plan something like that for the future?

I was just unsure about one thing. How do you intend to generate value for Tokens?It would be interesting if we could use them to buy wellness products, and pay for the gym, for example, do you plan something like that for the future?I assume they'll generate value for token like every other move2earn or play2earn project. almost all of them have multiple utilities for their tokens and also burning mechenisms (like leveling up charactors and wearable, repairing sneakers, buying gems, upgrading breeding, minting etc)so we need to see how WeSleep project implement such features and generate value for their token. the Idea looks promising to me too.

comments.author: WeSleep
comments.body: Quote from: r_victory on September 03, 2022, 08:29:45 PMI liked the project proposal and it will certainly be great to be rewarded for activities that we do naturally daily. I was just unsure about one thing. How do you intend to generate value for Tokens?It would be interesting if we could use them to buy wellness products, and pay for the gym, for example, do you plan something like that for the future?Since we are combining Web 2 (B2B2C) and Web 3 (Sleep 2 Earn), earned tokens will be used by users to claim our partners promos deals, such as: diet plans, gym memberships, food packages, sport clothing etc. At the same time, revenue, generated from our business partners on a cpm basis, will be put back into the governance and rewards token ecosystem in order to maintain the value in the long-term.

comments.body: Quote from: WeSleep on October 17, 2022, 01:17:53 PMSince we are combining Web 2 (B2B2C) and Web 3 (Sleep 2 Earn), earned tokens will be used by users to claim our partners promos deals, such as: diet plans, gym memberships, food packages, sport clothing etc. At the same time, revenue, generated from our business partners on a cpm basis, will be put back into the governance and rewards token ecosystem in order to maintain the value in the long-term.Yes, it's a good way to generate sustainability for the project's ecosystem, and make it gain traction and conquer more and more users.
